    Enclosing class:
    SettingsActivity

    public static class SettingsActivity.SettingsFragment
extends android.preference.PreferenceFragment
    Inner class which displays settings in a Fragment.
    Settings are loaded from an XML resource. Static for system access (restoring)

      • initializeActionBar

        private static void initializeActionBar(android.preference.PreferenceScreen preferenceScreen)
        Sets up the action bar for a PreferenceScreen.
        Some "hacky programming" required, to enable up navigation with "up-caret" in nested PreferenceScreens.
